title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Planning
body: Planning       Facilities Development Plan The National Park Service has created the Facilities Development Plan to guide the treatment of existing buildings and possible development of new facilities on the mainland at Saint Croix Island International Historic Site. Facilities Development Plan (pdf - 611kb) Finding of No Significant Impact (pdf - 467kb) For more information about the planning process for this plan, visit the National Park Service Planning, Environment, and Public Comment website.  Â     The McGlashan-Nickerson house is one of the buildings addressed in the Facilities Development Plan. NPS/Meg Scheid
